content.prompt: Built as a complex of artificial islands, Nan Madol was constructed with openings in its seawalls and breakwaters for the purpose of

choices.label: channeling seawater to altars during important religious ceremonies
routing water under the floor of royal residences to provide a cooling effect
irrigating agricultural areas used to grow food supplies inside the complex
providing a flow of water through the canals during the changing tides
